atk_abil: Normal Attack: Swing a cane to hurl a shadowy sphere, stunning and knocking back enemy.
Skill Attack: Removes stun and paralysis for up to 3 friendly targets and give them a shield that grants immunity to stun and paralysis. Also heals nearby friendly units by 15%.
Special Ability 1: Increases the game speed by 5%, movement speed of Undead units by 3% and attack range by 4%.
Special Ability 2: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase its own movement speed and attack speed.
Special Ability 3: Unaffected by attacks by terrain above stage 10,000
Senior Instructor (Undead): Increases the production speed of Undead guild unit by 7% per 5-star unit, 15% per 6-star unit. Applies in Time Shop, but can not exceed 150%.
Dark Lord Blessing: Every 10th stage, applies a 2% chance to increase game speed by 5x for 2 minutes. (if [Blessings of God] is active, game speed will increase by 6x. Does not apply in Time Shop)
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Swing a cane to hurl a shadowy sphere, stunning and knocking back enemy.
Skill Attack: Removes stun and paralysis for up to 3 friendly targets and give them a shield that grants immunity to stun and paralysis. Also heals nearby friendly units by 15%.
Special Ability 1: Increases the game speed by 10%, movement speed of Undead units by 6% and attack range by 7%.
Special Ability 2: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase its own movement speed and attack speed.
Special Ability 3: Unaffected by attacks by terrain above stage 10,000
Senior Instructor (Undead): Increases the production speed of Undead guild unit by 7% per 5-star unit, 15% per 6-star unit. Applies in Time Shop, but can not exceed 150%.
Dark Lord Blessing: Every 10th stage, applies a 5% chance to increase game speed by 5x for 2 minutes. (if [Blessings of God] is active, game speed will increase by 6x. Does not apply in Time Shop)
